articles.title: Greater Manchester's coronavirus death toll has risen sharply again - 785 people have now died - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: A further 49 COVID-19 patients have died in Greater Manchester's hospitals, the latest NHS figures reveal
articles.content:
Greater Manchester's coronavirus death toll has risen again after 49 more lives were claimed by the virus.
The latest NHS data shows that in total 785 people died in the region's hospitals after testing positive for COVID-19.
